name: waterbucket
0:
”Alexa open water bucket”
”ask water bucket I have drank two glasses of water”
”ask water bucket how much water have I drank till now”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: water bucket
des:
Want to stay hydrated and keep track of how many glasses of water have you drank till now?
This skill will help you with just that.
Simply use the following commands:
1. Open water bucket
2. Start a new bucket
3. i drank three glasses of water
4. remove one glass of water
5. How much water have i had till now
